ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Definitely recommend if you're interested in the material and have some background in PET imaging.
If you are interested in PET modeling or an understanding of tracer kinetics, this is a great class.

This course walks you through the history of the development of all kinds of tracer kinetics modeling, discusses the physiological principles vividly and derives the corresponding modeling equations clearly. I would definitely recommend this course to students who are interested in PET modeling& imaging.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I learned a remarkable amount about the topic from this class. Easily the most thorough understanding of a topic that I've gotten from any class here.
Helps me to better understand PET modeling, why one models, the limitations of models, etc.

Before taking this course, I was often confused with some concepts in PET modeling although I use them everyday. After this course, many concepts are made clear to me and would definitely contribute to the background part of my dissertation. It also sets an essential foundation for my qualification exam next fall.
